message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $18,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
